channel.title: Error with jaring
channel.description:
everytime i jar my client and log onto my server and it gets stuck at loading please wait? i get this error?
[code]Shamon Scape Client Is Loading... Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class25.method279(Class25.java:164) at Class7.method171(Unknown Source) at client.method22(client.java:581) at client.method54(client.java:2496) at client.method53(client.java:2444) at client.method62(client.java:2880) at client.method7(client.java:2020) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:119) at client.run(client.java:4340) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Error with jaring
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
